title: SongScript sources ralphtools skills via symlink
description: Configure SongScript to source skills from ralphtools so it automatically gets updated Convex patterns, user deletion workflows, and other tested skills. Use symlink or CLAUDE.md reference.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Document skill sourcing pattern in ralphtools README
Add instruction to SongScript CLAUDE.md: source skills from ~/.claude/commands/
Verify Convex skill workflows are accessible from SongScript context
Test: Claude in SongScript can use /convex workflows
Document how to update skills (pull ralphtools, skills auto-update)
